headline: How BXP’s (BXP) Shift Toward Disciplined Acquisitions Is Reframing Its Growth Narrative
summary: In recent days, BXP, Inc. reported third-quarter 2025 earnings and full-year guidance, noting US$845.21 million in sales and a net loss of US$121.71 million for the quarter, accompanied by management's continued focus on new development projects and disciplined acquisition opportunities. Management expressed confidence in maintaining strong leasing performance despite new competition in Boston and highlighted a shift in acquisition opportunities emerging over the past six months, reflecting...
